Description:
The game continues the tradition of the famous series "Behind Enemy Lines 2" and the historical strategy of "black jackets."Real Time Strategy "The Penal Battalion" is based on the memoirs of soldiers and other documentary materials. It disclosed the history of a single shot (the officer) Battalion of the Central and later Belarus, Front. For a long time, they are not accepted to speak, and they themselves were instructed not to speak about himself and his actions during World War II. Penal inevitably became the heroes of many hard-hitting myths that have developed around the order of the People's Commissar of Defense of the USSR Ã¢â€žâ€“ 227 dated 27 July 1942, also known as Stalin's order, "Not one step back." The ban on official information about penal battalions and companies, as well as defensive squads that operated during the war and for many years after its end, it has generated a lot of rumors and idle speculation. Conception, they were based only on distorted impressions of people vaguely heard of these units. Now is the time to learn the truth about the courage of soldiers penal battalion. They were heroic journey from the Kursk Bulge to Berlin, and to perform the feat, they did not need guns detachments behind.
